questions.question:
Did you process the personal data of:
a. more than 1,000 (one thousand) Data Subjects in the last 6 months; or
b. More than 2,000 Data Subjects in the last 12 months?
questions.guidance: This question determines if your organization falls under mandatory NDPA compliance requirements based on data processing volume.

questions.question: Is your top-management aware of the Nigeria Data Protection Act (NDPA) and the potential implication on your organisation?
questions.guidance: Management awareness and commitment is crucial for effective NDPA compliance implementation.

questions.question: Have you implemented any information security standard in your organisation before? If YES, specify.
questions.guidance: Previous implementation of security standards can facilitate NDPA compliance.

questions.question: Do you have a documented data breach incident management procedure?
questions.guidance: A documented breach management procedure is required under NDPA.

questions.question: Do you collect and process personal information through digital mediums?
questions.guidance: Digital processing of personal data requires specific security measures under NDPA.
